Source.Name: glibc
Source.Summary: GNU libc6 (also called glibc2) C library
Source.Description: The GNU C library is used as the C library in the GNU system and most systems with the Linux kernel. It defines the system calls and other basic C programming language facilities.

Update.Comment: Version bump to 2.5, hashvals is now deprecated, lots of cleanup for package
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Split all locales into seperated locale packages
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Move nl* into glibc package, so glibc-locales can be excluded from CD
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Fix some performance issues since wrap-around segments as used by glibc need expensive extra handling (see http://wiki.xensource.com/xenwiki/XenSpecificGlibc)
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Use madvise syscall to inform kernel about memory usage, and depend linux-headers-2.6.15+
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Default timezone is set by util-linux package
Update.Name: Gürer Özen

Update.Comment: glibc-2.3.5-readahead.diff added (for preloading libraries), with this we'll gain ~%5 extra performance
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Our toolchain is young enough for as-needed. So as-needed enabled
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur
